title: The Saint-Germain Chronicles (Saint-Germain #6)
description: Storyline: The Saint-Germain Chronicles (Saint-Germain #6) \n Stories and novellas that range widely in time and place, from 18th century England to 20th century America. Sixth book published in this series. Story list: Art Songs; Cabin 33; My Favorite Enigma (essay); Renewal; Seat Partner; Spider Glass.\n
author: Chelsea Quinn Yarbro
